# stopPlayback(animated:)

**Instance Method**

Stops playback of a Live Photo in an animated manner.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func stopPlayback(animated: Bool)
```

## Parameters

- **animated**: A Boolean value that indicates whether playback stops immediately or with animation.

## Discussion

Calling this method with a value of `false` is the same as calling [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHLivePhotoView/stopPlayback()].

## Manually Playing Live Photo Content

- **startPlayback(with:)**: Begins playback of Live Photo content in the view.
- **stopPlayback()**: Stops playback of a Live Photo.
